sectionWhatWeDo.subtitle: We are a company dedicated to software development, design, and consulting
sectionWhatWeDo.description: Tenzee Solutions' mission is to collaborate with startups and small business that want to scale and grow your business through the development of a customized web and mobile application

steps.name: Product Definition
steps.description: Understand business specifications, market size and define core functionallity

steps.name: Prototype
steps.description: Define all the prototypes, wireframes and use cases

steps.name: Design
steps.description: Create a datailed design of the solution

steps.name: Development
steps.description: Implemet all the design models, business logic, and service integrations defined in the prior stages

steps.name: Validation
steps.description: Ensure that the solution meet the expectations and works properly

steps.name: Deployment
steps.description: Deploy the solutions to the cloud when it can finally reach the final users

steps.name: Continuous Iteration
steps.description: Mantain and iterate continuously over the process to continue growing

sectionTechnologies.title: Business competitive solutions
sectionTechnologies.subtitle: We stay in the vanguard of the top end technologies, choosing the most advanced ones to design, develop and deploy business competitive solutions tailored for each individual client
